response: narrative=Dominic Hart was last seen at his home on North Lane, Archiestown. According to his daughter, there had been an ongoing dispute related to child custody arrangements, involving Dominic as a supportive figure. On the day he went missing, he had mentioned to his colleague, Marilyn Johnson, that he intended to visit Gordon Crescent, but he never arrived. The tension around the custody situation was a source of stress for him, prompting concerns from his family. Despite the initial low risk assessment, the search extended over several days. Eventually, the police traced him to Mill Road, Insch. Dominic had become disoriented due to his disability, leading him to wander further than intended, but he was found safe.
